headline: Allstate Reports Second Quarter 2025 Results
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., July 30, 2025--The Allstate Corporation (NYSE: ALL) today reported financial results for the second quarter of 2025.

headline: Allstate (ALL) Q2 Earnings Top Estimates
summary: Allstate (ALL) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +78.92% and -2.91%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Allstate (ALL) Q2 Earnings Top Estimates

headline: Allstate quarterly profit jumps on underwriting strength
summary: Allstate reported a jump in second-quarter profit on Wednesday, driven by strong underwriting performance and increased investment returns. Property and casualty insurers benefited during the quarter as individuals and businesses continued spending on insurance policies amid macroeconomic uncertainty and concerns over severe weather-related catastrophes. Underwriting income in Allstate's property-liability segment jumped to $1.28 billion in the second quarter, up from a loss of $145 million in the year-ago period.

headline: We’re in our 60s, retired, have $70,000 in savings and Social Security of about $3,780/month. How can we survive?
summary: Considering the fact that 27% of seniors rely on Social Security alone, it could be worse.
